page.title: 02Housing.
page.content: The housing in this area is mixed. Most of the older houses being built of local gritstone. In Matlock Bath all the houses are on the western side of the gorge. In Starkholmes the houses face west. There are isolated pockets of modern development, the only fairly large group of houses being on Tor Rise off Starkholmes Road. Because of the steep slopes houses have been built following the main roads. Matlock Town is the original centre of Matlock and lies in the area surrounding St. Gile's Church.
